userProfile.who: Knowledge worker, developer, or creative professional
userProfile.coreProblem: Wants an AI that learns them, remembers context, and works proactively without sending data to the cloud
userProfile.wowMoment: Opening the app and seeing Senter already knows what they're working on

userStories.title: User can start the app and have it actually respond
userStories.userValue: When user types a message, Senter responds intelligently using the LLM
userStories.wowFactor: Response comes quickly and feels conversational, not robotic
acceptanceCriteria: App starts without errors when running start-mvp.sh
User types a message and receives a response within 5 seconds
Response is contextual and helpful, not generic or empty
Backend and frontend communicate correctly via HTTP API

technicalRequirements.polish: Loading indicator while waiting, smooth message appearance

userStories.notes: DONE: Server starts, responds intelligently with contextual answers, returns goals/trust/memories

userStories.title: User can have a conversation Senter remembers
userStories.userValue: Conversation history persists across sessions and influences responses
userStories.wowFactor: Ask 'what were we talking about yesterday?' and get a real answer
acceptanceCriteria: Previous conversations are loaded on startup
Senter references past discussions naturally in responses
Memory feels seamless, not like reading a transcript
At least 3 previous exchanges are considered in context

technicalRequirements.polish: Natural integration of past context, not forced

userStories.notes: DONE: 525 memories loaded, response references user name 'Jordan' and past goals from conversations

userStories.title: User sees their AI-detected goals when they open the app
userStories.userValue: Without entering anything, Senter shows what it thinks user is working toward
userStories.wowFactor: Goals appear that user never explicitly entered - 'How did it know?'
acceptanceCriteria: Goals panel shows at least one detected goal on app open
Goals are actually detected from conversation history
Goals have meaningful progress indicators
User can dismiss or correct goals

technicalRequirements.performance: Goals appear within 2 seconds of app load
technicalRequirements.polish: Beautiful progress bars, category icons, smooth animations

userStories.notes: DONE: 7 goals detected and returned via API (Focus on python, etc.) with confidence scores and evidence

userStories.title: User can see their activity context recognized
userStories.userValue: Senter knows 'you're coding' or 'you're browsing' and shows it
userStories.wowFactor: Context-aware badge updates as user switches applications
acceptanceCriteria: Activity badge shows current context (coding, browsing, writing, etc.)
Context updates within 30 seconds of switching applications
At least 3 context types are detected correctly
Context is used in conversation responses

technicalRequirements.polish: Smooth badge transitions, appropriate icons per context

userStories.notes: DONE: Activity endpoint works, returns context/project/duration. ActivityMonitor initialized in server. Context starts 'unknown' and updates as captures happen.

userStories.title: User gets proactive suggestions that feel relevant
userStories.userValue: Senter offers help before being asked based on detected goals/activity
userStories.wowFactor: Suggestion appears right when user needed it
acceptanceCriteria: Suggestions appear as non-intrusive toasts
Suggestions are based on detected activity and goals
At least 50% of suggestions feel useful to the user
Easy to dismiss or act on suggestions
userStories.notes: DONE: Lowered trust threshold to 0.3. Now returns goal-based suggestions like 'Get started on: Focus on python'

userStories.title: User sees what Senter learned while they were away
userStories.userValue: After time away, user gets a summary of what Senter did
userStories.wowFactor: Senter actually researched something relevant to their goals
acceptanceCriteria: Away modal appears when user returns (>30 min away)
Summary includes at least one piece of new information
Research is related to user's actual detected goals
Sources are cited with links

technicalRequirements.polish: Beautiful modal design, clear summary, actionable insights

userStories.notes: DONE: Away endpoint returns duration, summary, research array. Background research scheduled but needs time to accumulate results.
